short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for UK Robotics D2 Dispenser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension/Plugin used to control UK Robotics D2 plate dispenser. This plugin can be used without Internet access. Protocols and calibration data is saved locally and hence no Internet access is required to use D2. If you are transitioning from using our web based software you are able to export protocols and calibrations to CSV and import them into the D2 Chrome Plugin.
